roleset.name: perform a post-mortem dissection in search of cause of death

role.descr: agent, entity performing or responsible for autopsy

example.name: with arg2
example.text: [Twenty-two]-1 patients were autopsied *trace*-1 for brain damage.

example.name: dead winos take all args
example.text: hey find dead winos every day , maybe they wo n't even autopsy him for the cause of death '' .
